Html:
Hello.

I use ToolTipMode to GMapMarker and see info in Map. I create GMapRoute and see cool line and all marker. And i won't see info in line.

I rewrite source and add ToolTipMode in GMapRoute but ToolTipMode work only in Marker. You use graphics to write line and more... And you need use any array to render all info...  

Please, give me any help to structure you project or any metods to create this.
use event OnRouteEnter and display usual tooltip at the current mouse position
